text: Unlike other regions of the forest, Atylwyth's defence has ever relied upon the bravery and battle-skill of the Elves alone
The Bow of Loren is strung with the hair of Elf maids and enchanted with potent charms for increased power.
Sceolan carries a buckler instead of an ordinary shield. This is a small shield with a spiked front, the spikes are arranged in an arcane pattern
Sceolan has a tactical mind for finding the enemy at their weakest and making them suffer.

Sceolan is the ruler of the High Realm of Atylwyth, also known as the Winterheart. "Nowhere else in Athel Loren can Eternal Guard be found in such numbers as they can in the halls and holds of Lord Sceolan"
Not only does he use the longbow, but he is an expert hand-to-hand fighter
Sceolan of the Hooked Blade is the oldest and most cunning of the Wood Elf warriors.
